Row.Text: Open your borders to them.[n][icon:YIELD_GOLD] +2 per turn.

Do a Research Collaboration with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +4[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn. Other Leader receives +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +6[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn.
[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +6 per turn for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +2 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +4 per turn.

Have a Cultural Exchange with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn. Other Leader receives +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +6[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn.
[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] +6 per turn for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] +2 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] +4 per turn.

Have Minor Trade with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn. Other Leader receives +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +6[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +6 per turn for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +2 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_GOLD] +4 per turn.

Have Local Festivals with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per turn in Cities. Other Leader receives +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per turn in Cities.
[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] +3 per turn in Cities for both Leaders
[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] +2 per turn[n]{1_initialName} receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] per turn in Cities

Share agricultural goods with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in Towns. Other Leader receives +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +3[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in Towns.
[icon:YIELD_FOOD] +3 per turn in Towns for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +2 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_FOOD] +2 per turn in Towns.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +2 per turn.[n]The other Leader has your claimed territory revealed to them over time.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +2 per turn.[n]Other Leader's Units get +2 Combat Strength.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +30.[n]{1_initialName} can start an additional Trade Route with you.
Wonder Construction
Grants a bonus to Wonder construction.

Grants a bonus to Wonder construction.[n]Accepted: You get +10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing Wonders. Other Leader receives +6[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders get +15%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing Wonders.
[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] +15% towards constructing Wonders for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] +6 per turn.[n] {1_initialName} gets [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] +10% towards constructing Wonders.
Wonder Construction

Have Ginseng Agreements with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in your Capital. Other Leader receives +2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in their Capital.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +6[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in their Capitals.
[icon:YIELD_FOOD] +6 per turn for both Leaders in their Capitals.
[icon:YIELD_FOOD] +2 per turn in your Capital.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_FOOD] +4 per turn in their Capital.
Make an ally into a Friend of Wei.[n]Accepted: Both Leaders receive +25%[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science.
Make an ally into a Friend of Wei.[n]Accepted: Both Leaders receive +25%[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science.
[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +25%.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +25%.
Poison Wells
Cause a Minor Outbreak in a Settlement
